markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Uniila (Cabal Devil)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2520)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Uniilas frequently join mortal cults, but not as leaders—instead, the uniila lurks behind the master or demagogue who leads the cult.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 29

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Devil_Uniila.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Uniila](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2520)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Devil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=44" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #190: The Choosing](/Sources.aspx?ID=198) pg. 87</row>

**Perception** +21; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +20, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +23, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +22, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +20, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +21, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +22

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +6

**Con** +4

**Int** +7

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [daggers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ (4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 30 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +21 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)
</row>

**HP** 155

**Immunities**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)

**Resistances**
physical 10 (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379))

**Weaknesses**
good 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+9 piercing plus 1d6 evil

**Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 29, attack +21
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Touch of Idiocy](/Spells.aspx?ID=341) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Resilient Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=255) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[Crushing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=57), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Shadow Siphon](/Spells.aspx?ID=274) (3 slots)

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 29
- **4th**
[Blink](/Spells.aspx?ID=27), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will), [Discern Lies](/Spells.aspx?ID=74), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Outcast's Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=211), [Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247)
- **5th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69)

**Rituals** DC 29

- **1st**
[Infernal Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=23)

**Every Dagger** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Requirements** The uniila wields four daggers; **Effect** The uniila attempts a single dagger Strike against a target. If this Strike hits, the uniila deals three extra dice of weapon damage.

**Fearsome Magic** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Metamagic](/Traits.aspx?ID=107)) **Frequency** Once per hour; **Effect** If the uniila's next action is to cast a harmful spell, creatures who fail their saving throw against the spell are [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 2 on a critical failure), in addition to the spell's other effects.

**Witch Token**  ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33)) (1 hour) **Frequency** Once per day; **Effect** The uniila creates a token in the shape of a piece of jewelry. When the _witch token_ is [invested](/Traits.aspx?ID=98) by a mortal, all of the mortal's spells, except those cast at the highest level the mortal can cast, count as 1 level higher for the purpose of [counteracting](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) other spells and being counteracted. The creature can also Activate the _witch token_ to Cast a Spell once per day. This spell is chosen from one of the uniila's arcane spontaneous spells of level 4 or lower when the uniila creates the token. While a creature has the _witch token_ invested, it treats its saving throws against the uniila's spells as one degree of success worse, and the uniila always knows the distance and direction to the creature. A creature can't have more than one _witch token_ invested, and an uniila can't have more than one _witch token_ in existence. The uniila can destroy their _witch token_ as a free action with the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait; if the _witch token_ is invested when the uniila does so, the creature that has the witch token invested takes 9d8 mental damage (DC 29 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save).

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="">Uniila Occultists</title>

Some uniilas study occult magic, rather than arcane magic, to better manipulate mystery cults or eldritch cabals. These more subtle uniilas cast occult spells instead of arcane spells; they cast [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=15) instead of [_glitterdust_](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [_mind reading_](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) instead of [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [_modify memory_](/Spells.aspx?ID=200) instead of [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), and [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246) instead of [_ray of frost_](/Spells.aspx?ID=245).
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-30" />
name: Uniila

<trait label="Devil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=44" />

<additional-info>

</row>
</additional-info>

---

</summary>
